## Focus

***
This drop-down menu let you focus on: 

*	  the entire set of 121 countries covered by the study;
*	  a selected country;
*	  a selected administrative unit.

**Select** a country or administrative area by clicking on the map.

The 121 countries covered by the study are shown on Map 1 of the section  **Overview** of the **Background & Methods** tab. These countries are the one you can highlight on the map of the dashboard.
